entry.message:
[DQC.US.0067.7644] The filing has reported a value of "-274,000" for the element us-gaap:IncreaseDecreaseInDeferredRevenueAndCustomerAdvancesAndDeposits. This is a revenue recognition element that is not a component of FASB 606 and does not appear in disclosure group 606000. However the following elements have also been tagged in the filing that indicate that the FASB 606 revenue recognition standard has been adopted: ContractWithCustomerAssetAndLiabilityTableTextBlock, ContractWithCustomerAssetNetCurrent, ContractWithCustomerLiabilityCurrent, ContractWithCustomerLiabilityIncreaseDecreaseForContractAcquiredInBusinessCombination, ContractWithCustomerLiabilityRevenueRecognized, DisaggregationOfRevenueTableTextBlock, RevenueFromContractWithCustomerExcludingAssessedTax, RevenueFromContractWithCustomerTextBlock, RevenuePerformanceObligationDescriptionOfWarranty, RevenueRemainingPerformanceObligation, RevenueRemainingPerformanceObligationPercentage
Either the new revenue recognition elements must be used or the old revenue recognition elements should be used but they should not be combined in the same filing.
The properties of this us-gaap:IncreaseDecreaseInDeferredRevenueAndCustomerAdvancesAndDeposits fact are: Period :2022-04-01 to 2023-03-31 Dimensions : Unit : USD
Rule Element Id:7644 Rule version: 22.0.0RC1 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1005229/000100522923000169/cmco-20230331.htm 4

property.name: label
property.value: Increase (Decrease) in Deferred Revenue and Customer Advances and Deposits
